info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 23 at 2:13AM MST until December 25 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, ground blizzard conditions possible. Winds could gust as high as 90 mph. * WHERE...The Continental Divide along the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 11 AM MST this morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, while drifting snow could lead to partial or complete lane blockages.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible ground blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
